text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The day is finally here! The only<n>question is, which
Umamusume will<n>take the crown and give us a new<n>
dream for the future?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: The Japanese Derby is about to<n>begin!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The Japanese Derby... It's a very<n>special race for
Umamusume, trainers,<n>and fans alike.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The 2,400-meter turf track is one of<n>the major races of the
Twinkle Series<n>Classic Triple Crown.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
They say becoming a Derby<n>champion trainer is even
harder than<n>becoming prime minister.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Prime minister? I don't think I know<n>what that is! But they
must be pretty<n>amazing, right?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And the Derby's even harder than<n>becoming a super
awesome person<n>like that, huh. That's exactly why...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume who wins it will<n>inspire hopes and dreams
in alllll the<n>people watching her!
choice_data_list: Ticket, I didn't know you were here!
Ticket, I didn't know you were here!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Course I'm here! It's theJapanese Derby we're talking about!A must-see!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
But, hey! I never thought I'd see you<n>here, ant-fan! Sooo
glad I did though!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Whoa! The race is about to start!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: This is it! The dream race for both<n>fans and racers...

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Begins now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
All racers have rounded the fourth<n>corner! They're on the
fated final<n>stretch!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Wahaaagh! Go, go, go! Go for it,<n>everybodyyy!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Gah! Look at number five! What an<n>amazing last push! Ah,
but number<n>eleven's making a late charge too!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Whoooa, there's the favorite, but<n>she's coming in from far
outside! Is<n>she going for it? For real?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: THAT'S THE FINIIISH! The topUmamusume has been decided!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: She did iiit! Amazing... Everyone tried...<n>so hard...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Waaaaagh! I'm melting wiv<n>emoshooooon!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It takes a little time for Winning Ticket<n>to stop crying from all
the excitement.<n>Actually... it takes a really long time.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Ahhh... What an amazing race!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The Derby really is the best! Uuugh! I<n>can't wait to race in
iiit!
choice_data_list: You feel pretty strongly about the Derby, huh?
You feel pretty strongly about the Derby, huh?

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: You bet I do!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I got to do so many sports when I<n>was a kid, but watching a
race for the<n>first time was really special for me!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I was only watching on TV, but even<n>so! The energy of the
crowd was<n>sooo amazing!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
I could tell the crowd got all charged<n>up from watching the
racers giving it<n>their all!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: It was so... so... incredible! I just...Sniff...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Pwagh! I'm fine! Heheheh, thinking<n>about it suddenly got
me all choked<n>up!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
That's the gist, though. The race track<n>was always where I
wanted to be...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then one day, I went to see it<n>with my family! The
Japanese Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
The heat! The passion! Even as a<n>little kid, clueless about
racing—I could<n>feel it!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: I knew it was a totally special,<n>one-of-a-kind place!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
And then! All the fans around me told<n>me, "The Derby is a
place filled with<n>dreams!"

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
"And the Derby champion makes all<n>those dreams come
true!"

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: That's why I've got to win the<n>Derby!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Just like the racers I saw on TV back<n>then! Like the racers I
saw from the<n>stands that day! Like everyone who<n>ran so
hard here today!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
One day, I'll do it too! I'll be the one<n>who inspires dreams in
everyone's<n>hearts! The Derby champiooon!
choice_data_list: That's an admirable goal to have.
That's an admirable goal to have.

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: What?! You think it's a-a-ambirable?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Heh, really? Hehehe... Eheheh! Whoa,<n>I'm all jittery and
blushing. Almost<n>itchy...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: But thanks! I'm gonna work hard for<n>my dream!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Oh, before that, I need to find a trainer<n>to work with. So I can
make... my...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Debuuuuut?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
W-w-wait! Ant-fan! That... that badge<n>on your collar! Could
you be...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: A TRAINER?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yep! Just now!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: So, I'm begging you! Please be my<n>trainer!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text:
Please. please, please! I've got to<n>become a Derby
champion! I just<n>have to!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Based on our interactions thus far,<n>her earnestness is
painfully clear to<n>me...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And a true trainer would never refuse<n>someone so honest
and devoted!
choice_data_list: All right! Let's go for the Derby together!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Reallyyy?!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Yaaa-HOOOOO!

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thank you! I really mean it! Thank<n>you... Thank you...

text_block_list.name: Winning Ticket
text_block_list.text: Thank you sooo muuuch! Waaaaah!
